thread.title: MIC's Louise Thompson flashes her cleavage in fuchsia gown
thread.title_full: MIC's Louise Thompson flashes her cleavage in fuchsia gown | Daily Mail Online

author: MailOnline Reporter
title: MIC's Louise Thompson flashes her cleavage in fuchsia gown
text:
She never fails to impress on the red carpet.
And Louise Thompson stayed true to her chic credentials on Saturday evening, as she stunned in a showstopping fuchsia gown at the BAFTA nominees party at Kensington Palace.
The Made In Chelsea star, 26, looked sensational in the silky creation, which teased more than a hint of her cleavage thanks to a plunging neckline.
Quite the eyeful! Louise Thompson, 26, teased more than a hint of her cleavage in a showstopping fuchsia gown at the BAFTA nominees party at Kensington Palace on Saturday
Louise subtly showed off her svelte frame in the floor-sweeping number, which featured opulent bell sleeves and tie-belt to cinch in her tiny waist.
Wearing her glossy raven tresses in an understated middle-parting, the reality star added some decadent glittering chandelier earrings.
Highlighting her vivid pink gown, the brunette beauty added a slick of claret lipstick and framed her eyes with smokey bronze shadow.
Swaying her gown from side to side, the E4 star looked comfortable as she posed at the event, which was hosted by Nespresso.
Chic: Louise subtly showed off her svelte frame in the floor-sweeping number, which featured opulent bell sleeved and tie-belt to cinch in her tiny waist
Turning heads: Wearing her glossy raven tresses in an understated middle-parting, the reality star added some decadent glittering chandelier earrings

Louise made sure all eyes were on her at the BAFTA nominee party in West London and hit the red carpet in a stunning fuchsia gown and a pair of killer gold heels.
We love her frock, but its her chunky heels that really caught our eye as they are not just stylish, but they are majorly versatile too!
A simple pair of metallic sandals will seamlessly take you from girls night out to posh wedding, and will work with everything, and we mean everything in your wardrobe.
You can treat your feet to the very same pair as the MIC star now at PrettyLittleThing, or shop similar golden wonders below from the likes of New Look, Miu Miu and ASOS.

Meanwhile, Louise recently admitted she kept her relationship with personal trainer Ryan a secret for five months to stop people judging her 'for moving on so quickly' from her MIC co-star Alik Alfus.
She also told OK! Magazin e that while she supported her pregnant co-star Binky Felstead, she didn't think her boyfriend JP 'is the guy for her’.
Louise revealed that the couple kept their relationship a secret at first and that Ryan joined her in the South of France while filming last summer, but stayed in a separate hotel.
She said: ‘The production team found out I had a secret boyfriend while we were over there and were pretty annoyed at me! But they said they’d forgive me if I got Ryan to join the show.'
Highlighting her vivid pink gown: The brunette beauty added a slick of claret lipstick and framed her eyes with smokey bronze shadow
‘We actually kept our relationship to ourselves for about five months.’
She explained: ‘I didn’t want people judging me for moving on so quickly after Alik.
'Ryan didn’t even come to my house for the first five months because I didn’t know how my brother Sam would react.’
Working her angles: Swaying her gown from side to side, the E4 star looked comfortable as she posed at the event, which was hosted by Nespresso
